summary: Implemented comprehensive plan to create missing pages and align Beauty Booking module design with Rental module. Created 8 new view files (admin: new-requests, new-requests-details, bulk-import, bulk-export, email-settings, home-page-setup; vendor: review/list, settings/settings). Updated routes and controllers with new methods. Aligned key admin and vendor pages (salon/index, category/index, booking/index, staff/index, service/index) with Rental module design patterns including consistent page headers, card structures, and search/export button layouts.
current_status: All major missing pages created. Design alignment completed for key pages. Routes and controllers updated. Remaining work: Complete design alignment for all 105 pages (45 admin + 40 vendor + 20 customer) can be done incrementally following the established patterns. Email format settings and home page setup pages created with basic structure - can be expanded with full functionality later.
